Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: 'Your view turns hazy under the relentless downpour.'}
{3: 'Two mechanoids make their way along a shallow rut, hauling a crate of batteries. As they pass, they kick up a small splash of murky water.'}
{3: "The rainstorms descend in silence. You don't spot Yalin before leaving for the campsite, so you start looking for her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: '【kuroname】! Hanying!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Boccioni calls out both your name and Hanying's."}
{3: "He's pushing a shipping container, and as soon as you see him struggling, you hurry over to help."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: "L-let's get it to a safe spot first. I'm pretty sure there's a thief out there...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A thief?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You instinctively reach for the weapon at your hip.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Someone took my oilcloth tarp!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "I really don't want to rely on my waterproof plating alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory733.jpg'}
{3: 'Hanying helps Boccioni push open the warehouse door at the camp. This hastily built storage facility is the handiwork of the Bixi Crew.'}
{3: 'After placing the container in the corner, you turn on the lights.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Thanks. We're in real trouble if these documents get soaked.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is there anything else we might have dropped?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "No, I've just checked everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It could've been borrowed by someone at the last minute...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "That's definitely possible, but I'm realizing I got too anxious earlier, which wasn't very sensible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Have you seen Yalin?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'She mentioned she was looking for you before heading out.', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Yalin? Has she not returned home yet?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'When was the last time you saw her?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Before four o'clock this afternoon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "There wasn't any rain yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: '??', 3: 'So, are you asking me to lend a hand?'}
{3: 'A familiar, gruff voice rises from the shadows.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'How did you all get here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dazhu studies the three faces in front of him, each wearing the same confused look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Dazhu, why are you here too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I'm worried we're gonna run outta sandbags if the flood hits, so I'm grabbing some more.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'This rain just started out of nowhere, seriously...', 4: '1'}
{2: "We're here to find Yalin.", 3: '58'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "That little girl? I haven't seen her today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Hold on... You're here to find her? So she's missing?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Where can anyone go in this downpour? I'll get the Bixi Crew to help.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'We need to have your men evacuate the crowd now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Where do we evacuate people to? This spot ain't even got ventilation! Even I'd feel damn suffocated if I had to stay here for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'If the nearby river levels rise, there could be casualties.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'All the danger zones are marked, and the Bixi Crew is keeping an eye on things.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Excuse me, gentlemen!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying interrupts the two of them.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Let's take the children here first and have the others rescue the camp. Is that okay?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After she finishes speaking, Hanying looks at you.'}
{2: 'We can handle looking for Yalin by ourselves.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yalin mentioned she was going to meet Boccioni before she left.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Ah yeah, today Yalin came to me and asked about reinforcing the shed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "But we've already set up the shed a while ago, and the potatoes won't be ready for harvest until next month.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'Also, that little girl asked me for some vines...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'A shed helps saplings sprout faster.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The original plan is to check on the saplings tomorrow.'}
{3: "You never expected this to be Yalin's secret."}
{3: "You catch a flicker of unease in Hanying's eyes."}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Besides, that's my downtime. I told her to come back and find me later.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'From what I can tell, she should be home by now.', 4: '2'}
{3: "But that's not the case."}
{3: 'The answer seems to be within reach. After locking eyes with Hanying, you nod.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'She could only be there.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, the two of you head straight out of the warehouse.'}
{3: 'Boccioni, staying at the camp, looks over at Dazhu.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Were they just communicating on an encrypted channel?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'They just vibe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "But aren't they always...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'What?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "Hey, enough questions. Let's get to work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: 'It\'d be nice if you guys could "vibe" a bit better.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dazhu', 3: "I don't want you mechanoids and Babylonians to look down on me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dazhu dons his cloak, watches the water level rise, and lifts a sandbag.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'The girl strains to hold up a corner of the shed.'}
{3: 'When she just laid down the rain tarp, the downpour started.'}
{3: 'Rain, whipped by fierce winds, slightly lifts the wooden stakes and batters the canvas she set up with Boccioni only yesterday.'}
{3: 'Luckily, she had prepared in advance. After Boccioni left, she quietly took the waterproof green tarp he left at the camp.'}
{3: 'Thunder crashes, pulling her out of her memories. Just moments ago, she was desperately protecting this small shed, but now, the sound startles her into a crouch.'}
{3: 'Once I shore up this area, I can head home.'}
{3: 'Yalin thinks to herself as she wipes the rain from her face.'}
{3: 'She coughs uncontrollably, then stands up, trying to keep the surprise she prepared for her two "parents" safe.'}
{3: 'The howling wind and rain echo through the hills, silent and equal.'}
{3: "Yalin pants heavily, unable to understand why she still can't secure a corner of the tarp"}
{3: "Right now, she's fascinated by how Boccioni can pull off these tasks so effortlessly."}
{3: "You glance ahead. Though the heavy rain hasn't stopped, it's lighter than before. Fierce winds lift a corner of the tarp-covered shed."}
{3: 'The mountain path is more treacherous than you expected. Hanying steadies you, while the bright green tarp stands out starkly in the night.'}
{3: 'You break into a run toward the shed and, sure enough, spot Yalin there.'}
{3: 'With no time to waste, you wrap the child in your cloak and lift her frail, slender body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "We're almost there...", 4: '18'}
{3: 'Hanying soothes the groggy Yalin.'}
{3: 'The scent of earth blends with the moisture in the air, forming a fog.'}
{3: 'The fog blankets the mountains and dense forests, obscuring the way home.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory752.jpg'}
{3: "As you move through the camp, it's clear that some areas have already been flooded, but you can't attend to them now."}
{3: "Back at the cabin, you carefully lay Yalin on the bed; the girl's consciousness is already fading."}
{3: "The situation looks grim as you place your hand on the girl's forehead."}
{2: "It's hot!", 3: '148', 4: 'She seems to have a fever.', 5: '148'}
{3: 'You retrieve the fever medicine from your coat, break a dose in half, and give it to Yalin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yalin', 3: "(I'm sorry for making you worry.)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yalin strains to make hand gestures; the aches from her fever make it difficult for her arms to lift.'}
{2: 'You just need to rest now.', 3: '155', 4: "You didn't do anything wrong.", 5: '155'}
{3: 'Hanying joins you in comforting her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yalin', 3: '(I want to take good care of those saplings.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(Can they hold up?)', 4: '1'}
{3: "Feeling somewhat relieved, Yalin can't help but smile."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "...I'm going to get a towel.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying quietly stands up to fetch the towel, while the girl grabs your hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yalin', 3: '(Can you stay with me for a while?)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(And Hanying.)', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yalin's eyes hold a pleading look."}
{3: "Hanying strides into the room without answering right away. She calmly folds the damp towel and places it on Yalin's forehead."}
{3: 'Yalin continues to reach out her hand.'}
{3: 'Hanying places her right hand over hers, and your left hand is gently pulled over.'}
{3: 'The girl carefully aligns the two hands together.'}
{3: 'Finally, your skin touches.'}
{3: 'You turn your gaze toward Hanying without even realizing it, and her amber eyes rise to meet yours.'}
{3: 'Outside the window, the rain softly tapers off. A silver gleam cuts through clouds and mist, illuminating her face.'}
{3: "You can't explain it, but the way your hands find each other feels so natural."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yalin', 3: '(I want to do something for this place too.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(Just like you.)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "You shouldn't push yourself so hard next time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With that said, it's clear Hanying still carries the weight of blame on her own shoulders."}
{2: "(You hold Hanying's hand.)", 3: '191'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(You two are more than just good friends, right?)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then a long, weighted silence settles in.'}
